content:
Hi, is it intentional that the links in the RelativePath box within a resource throws a 404? eg: http://hl7.org/fhir/patient-test.html#patient-test
on this page: http://hl7.org/fhir/implementationguide-example.html
Thanks
that one causes a warning in the build to the editor who has ignored it (referring to a resource that doesn't exist)
and the editor is probably me in this case
@Jeremy R Can you submit a technical correction request (using the 'propose a change' link at the bottom of any page in the spec) so we get this fixed in the next release?
